name: Dr. Lefty and Righty Hyde
description:
This Action Puzzle games puts you in control of the mad Dr. Lefty.
After a freak accident his butt gain a life of it's own! You must use both the doctor's brilliant mind and is back side's rumpty  posterior to collect a stool sample and run a test to complete each level.
